Welcome to Our Design Collective
We build brands and help grow businesses through designed solutions, that gives them a competitive edge. A brand strategy and design collective out of Bangalore, India.
Our Services
Crafting Memorable Logos
Logo Design
Our designs make your brand unforgettable. They're not just symbols; they're stories in themselves, narrating your essence. With a deep understanding of design principles and years of experience, we create logos that are not only visually appealing but also emotionally engaging. The logos we craft resonate with your audience and sets your brand apart from the competition.
Learn More
Building Unique Brand Identities
Brand Identity Design
Building brand identities goes beyond logos and color schemes. Your brand identity is not just about aesthetics; it's about the emotional connection it forges with your customers. We meticulously craft every aspect of your brand identity, from typography and visual elements to tone of voice and messaging, to ensure consistency and coherence. With our team of seasoned design strategists, we'll help you create a brand identity that reflects your core values and connects with your target audience on a profound level.
Learn More
Packaging That Tells a Story
Package Design
Packaging is your silent salesperson, and we believe it should be a compelling story about your product. We understand the power of packaging in making a lasting impression, and our designs ensure that your products not only look stunning but also convey the essence of your brand. Whether it's a box, bag, label, or container, our team of expert designers can transform it into a canvas that narrates your brand's story. Our packaging not only grabs attention but also leaves a memorable imprint on your customers.
Learn More
Transforming Vision into Digital Reality
Website Design & Development
In today's digital age, your website is often the first point of contact between your brand and your customers. Our website design and development services go beyond aesthetics; we create user-centric, responsive websites that seamlessly reflect your brand's essence. We bridge the gap between a beautifully designed website and one that drives results. Whether you need a simple, elegant website or a complex e-commerce platform, our experienced team transforms your vision into a digital reality that will engage your visitors and convert them into loyal customers.
Learn More
Dominating the Digital Marketplace
E-commerce SEO Overhaul
E-commerce is a fiercely competitive arena, and to stand out, you need a strategic edge. Our E-commerce SEO Overhaul service is designed to revolutionize your online sales strategy. We bring decades of experience and innovation to the table, ensuring that your brand doesn't just exist in the digital marketplace but dominates it. Our data-driven SEO enhancements not only boost your website's visibility but drives organic traffic and conversions. We're not just about keyword rankings; we're about enhancing your brand's online presence, authority, and revenue.

Creating Visual Showcases
Product Catalogue Photography
Our product catalogue photography service is about more than just taking pictures; it's about creating visual showcases that turn your products into works of art. We understand that each image in your catalog is a story in itself, a promise to your customers of what they can expect. That's why we approach product photography with an artist's eye and a marketer's strategy. Our team of skilled photographers and art directors meticulously capture your products, whether you need clean, elegant product shots or dynamic imagery, we're here to create visual showcases that captivates and sells.
Learn More
Immersing Customers in Your World
Brand Lifestyle Photography
Our product and brand lifestyle photography takes your customers on a journey. Every image is not just a picture; it's a tale of the lifestyle they can embrace with your brand. Our seasoned photographers and creative directors know how to infuse life into your brand's story. We capture images that immerse your customers in your world, making them a part of the narrative. From product shots that convey luxury and quality to lifestyle imagery that evokes aspiration and desire, we craft photography that transforms products into experiences.

Event Photography
Our event photography service is about more than just taking pictures; it's about capturing moments and creating lasting memories. We understand that events are more than gatherings; they're experiences. Our skilled photographers have the expertise to not only capture the essence of your events but also to create stories through their lenses. We transform moments into memories, and experiences into narratives. Whether it's a corporate event, a product launch, or a promotional activity, we ensure that every photograph tells a tale.

Our team of experienced filmmakers and storytellers turn your corporate narrative into a visually compelling and emotionally engaging journey. We produce films that not only convey your brand's essence but also create a lasting impression on your audience. From concept to script, filming, and post-production, we are your partners in crafting cinematic corporate stories that leave a mark.

Keyword Enriched Copywriting

We take a data-driven approach to keyword research and seamlessly integrate it into your copy to boost your brand's online presence. Portfolio

At Windsor & Souza, we take immense pride in the stories we've crafted for our clients. Our work is a testament to our creative prowess, innovation, and commitment to delivering exceptional results. Each project at our design studio is a unique journey, an opportunity to shape brands and create memorable experiences. Whether it's a logo design, a captivating product catalog, a website that stands out, or any other service we offer, our portfolio reflects our dedication to excellence and our ability to make brands shine. Discover the diverse range of projects that have left a lasting impact, driven by our passion for exceptional brand narratives. Each project is a chapter in our story, and we invite you to explore them.

About Us
With over 15 years of experience, Mario Windsor, a seasoned designer and branding expert, has left an indelible mark on the design and advertising landscape. He is passionate about crafting visual identities that transcend time. Alongside him, Marian D'Souza, a seasoned content producer and strategist for over 14 years, brings creative visions to life. His expertise in all things production, coupled with a keen eye for product and lifestyle photography, ensures your brand's narrative is rich and resonant. Together, we are your partners in crafting exceptional and impactful brand stories.
Meet the Visionary Designer
Mario Windsor
Mario Windsor, a seasoned designer and branding expert, boasts a rich tapestry of experience spanning 15 years. His creative prowess has left an indelible mark in the world of branding, and his love for storytelling through design has made him a sought-after visionary. Mario's mission is to reveal the essence of a brand through innovative design.
Meet the Creative Producer
Marian D'Souza
Marian D'Souza, a content producer and strategist, matches Mario's experience stride for stride. With a career spanning 14 years, Marian has worked on diverse projects, making a lasting impact on both corporate and creative endeavors. His expertise extends to video production, enriched by a profound talent for product and lifestyle photography.
